TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Stephen F Austin, 08-12-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Austin, August 12, 1829. Asking Austin to assist the ayuntamiento in its correspondence with him. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 246
